findings.title: Unaudited Imported Contracts
findings.description: Contract have importing contracts that is not audited, some functions may work unexpected way.

findings.title: _allowances[_msgSender()][spender] -= subtractedValue Incorrect Subtraction
findings.description: In the decreaseAllowance function block, the subtraction operation _allowances[_msgSender()][spender] -= subtractedValue could result in an incorrect value, it should be _allowances[_msgSender()][spender] – subtractedValue instead.

findings.title: Unaudited Dividend Tracker Modification
findings.description: The owner has the ability to modify the dividend tracker which may not be audited, potentially causing some functions to behave unexpectedly.

findings.title: Total supply shows without zero addresses balance
findings.description: The total supply of tokens is displayed without considering zero-balance addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change gas for processing
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify gas for processing which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum tokens before sell
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum token requirement before selling.

findings.title: Owner can change supplySoldTriggerRate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the supplySoldTriggerRate, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change charity and marketing addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify charity and marketing addresses.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude from fee, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can manually call buybackAndBurn()
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to manually call the buybackAndBurn function.

findings.title: Owner can change minimumTokenBalanceForDividends
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum token balance required for dividends.

findings.title: Owner can update claimWait value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to update the claimWait value, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.
